Text.Value: I thought we fought the same fight. Perhaps we do still - and I was only wrong about which side of it you stood on.
You would raise arms in my home? Against my family?
Well, I think this city is finished with me. I am certainly finished with it.
I know you did everything you could. More than I had any right to expect. And I have no doubt that you are more than a match for this cult.
And nor will Minsc. You shall have to make do without us, hero.
I cannot give you the death you deserve. Not without damning the city along with you. But I will not stay at your side a moment longer.
Nor will Minsc, I think. His choices are his own, but he has always been swifter to sniff out rot than I.
Was this your purpose all along, then? To aid me in saving my friend, only to trade him like cattle at the first convenience?
I'll keep him out of trouble - but know that when the time to face the Absolute comes, I will be there.
No more. You are free to forge your own path, but I will follow you no further.
I would journey to this path's end, my friend - but if you will not bring Minsc along... for all my debt to you, I owe him a deeper one.
I bear some blame for what you have become. I was so eager to take up my blades again, I did not look hard enough at what use I put them to.
But I think, perhaps, that I have gone as far as I am able. I will take Minsc back to his home, in Rashemen. And after that...
I have seen friends die before. But to do the deed myself...
We have followed a little too long, says Boo - and Minsc is in agreement.
Kill the Absolute - and should you die in the attempt, it would be a better end than you deserve.
And where Jaheira goes, so too go Minsc and Boo. Goodbye, my friend.
Was it some trick of the tadpole - to have me turn my blade on my own?
Why go so far - do so much to save my friend - only to cut him down?
You've freed Minsc from the cult's influence. Now it is for me to ensure that he stays that way for as long as I can.

Synopsis: Jaheira's leaving dialogue for low approval. Should cover all bases - with specific reactivity if she kills/makes Minsc leave.
